scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dist/{} \; && cd ..
scripts.pack: rm -f dist.zip && cp package.json dist/package.json && (cp .npmrc dist/.npmrc || true) && cd dist && npm install --cache=./.npm --production && zip -r ../dist.zip . ** && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run pack && serverless deploy
